Have SWMS been read, signed and methodology understood and agreed to.

Are perimeter exclusion zones required and have they been installed

Have plant pre-start inspection checks been completed, have checks been made to ensure ground conditions are safe for plant operation.
Are safety measures in place for working near a suspended loads
